bib.title: hrMWELex--A MWE lexicon of Croatian extracted from a parsed gigacorpus
bib.author: Ljube{\v{s}}ic, Nikola and Dobrovoljc, Kaja and Krek, Simon and Antonic, Marina Per{\v{s}}uric and Fi{\v{s}}er, Darja
bib.abstract: The paper presents the process of building the hrMWELex lexicon of multiword expressions extracted from the 1.9 billion-token parsed corpus of Croatian. The lexicon is built with the newly developed DepMWEx tool which uses dependency syntactic patterns to identify MWE
